apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this loving couple emoji is rendered with tender care, showcasing two figures embracing.  The woman-person, depicted with a medium-dark skin tone, is central, with a heart emoji appearing between them, glowing with Appleâ€™s characteristic soft gradients and subtle shine.  The overall impression is one of deep affection and partnership, with smooth, rounded forms that emphasize connection and togetherness in digital conversations.
